thread.title: Emergency repairs causing delays on main road
thread.title_full: Emergency repairs causing delays on main road

title: Emergency repairs causing delays on main road
text:
EMERGENCY gas repairs have been causing delays on a main Southampton road all day. Share article 
Gas workers have cordoned off part of Winchester Road to deal with an incident and traffic is slow in both directions, especially around the Chilworth Roundabout for those coming into the city. 
There are also delays on Basset Avenue southbound for planned gas works. Promoted Stories Emergency repairs causing delays on main road Sorry, an error occurred.
